p: This paper aims at analyzing some of the current unknowns on SARS-CoV-2 using recently published data and the available knowledge on coronaviruses infecting animals. Based on current scientific evidence, we elaborate the Environmental Change and Infectious Disease (EnvID) framework analysis ( 8) to facilitate the identification of relevant environmental and socio-economic factors that may affect disease burden and to provide links to interventions strategies in a One Health perspective.
